posts.post_content:
$215 shipped check/mo/pp

was in sgc20 holder...looks at least G/VG to me maybe downgraded due to stain.  guaranteed to get back into a holder.

[IMG]http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo147/quannimir/cards/t206johnson-1.jpg[/IMG][IMG]http://i370.photobucket.com/albums/oo147/quannimir/cards/johnb.jpg[/IMG]
Got any Plank cards for sale?

[quote name="Rob D." post=849293]Got any Plank cards for sale?[/QUOTE]

i heard there's a e107 on ebay.  be sure to ask for pic of card with today's newspaper...not sure about seller, the guy's been buying $3-$4 modern autographs suddenly have a plank for sale???

[quote name="T206.org" post=849295]That looks like blood![/QUOTE]

trae--that could be johnson's blood, making it a relic.  psa DNA division will probably authenticate it, or GAI would do so on monday.  if you prefer ugly clunky oversized holder go with beckett...  (sorry couldn't fit any sgc meme in)
Haha, Quan -- I just can't believe you posted your bloody johnson for sale on Net54. What do you think this is, Craig's List? :D
